title: Got Low Priority because I've lagged out of so many games, Help?
body: As the title says, I got low priority because my internet has been so slow which screws up my games (Attempting to reconnect etc), now that I have it fixed does me getting low priority ruin my chances of future gifts or prizes? And can I get this removed of off my account since I couldn't do anything to really prevent it

replies.body: You should look at getting a better internet connection as it is the individual players responsibility to stay connected to the game

>ruin my chances of future gifts or prizes?

As far as a player should be concerned, gifts and prizes are surprises, so you should not even be expecting them, or thinking that you're entitled to any. This is to encourage good behaviour in all aspects of the game at all times. And who knows, the next prize (if there is one) might not even be related to leaving games.
